s_synopsis: The story is set three years after Asura Blade. The world's at peace after the death of S. Geist, the main villain of Asura Blade. But now comes a new threat in the form of a yet unknown king who wants to become supreme lord of the world, while the sudden sinking of a whole continent has put the world into a state of chaos. Rising against the king are some of the fighters from Asura Blade together with a bunch of new warriors.
